column1: good length, 127kph, off stump, he's squared up and taken the back thigh trying to defend
back of a length, angled in, 121kph, he's back and working this with his wrists behind square
good length, hint of shape, he drives away from the body and gets a thick inside edge behind square
122kph, back of a length on off, he stands up and punches to mid off
127kph, wide half volley, he square drives firmly to deep point
leading edge runs past short third man, deep backward point runs around. He tried to work against the swing through the onside but gets away with it
slower and shorter, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
advances and flicks this in the air with the turn but it lands short of deep midwicket
floated up on middle, 87kph, he defends from the crease
shorter length, he's back and punching this to mid on
length ball wider, he backs away and lofts a square drive inside out over cover-point!
angled down leg, he sweeps hard past short fine!
126kph, angled into off, he drives to mid on and runs with the stroke
124kph, fractionally short, he sits back and cracks a pull shot hard behind square!
full and wide of off, he drives hard on the up to deep cover-point
Khawaja shimmies early and scoops a short ball fine over short fine! Great skills to get inside the line and get it fine, one bounce four
much full on off, he scoops again! Even better to get the fuller ball over short fine for four more
full outside leg, he backs away and whips to mid on
slower ball outside off, he slices a drive just short of the diving Milenko. Khawaja ran down and was sent back, Milenko fires and just misses! He would have been out
shorter and wider, he punches a back foot drive and Milenko makes another good save
half volley on leg stump, he whips hard along the ground to deep midwicket
138kph, full on leg, he clips this neatly off the toes to deep square
slower ball, top of middle, he's back and working this to deep midwicket
shorter length on leg, he flicks this off the hip to deep backward square
135kph, short on the hip, he short arm pulls this beautifully behind square! Wonderful shot. Timed it superbly
length slower ball, 113kph, he picks it, backs away and heaves this over wide mid on!
top edge flies safe fine of fine leg! 133kph, short ball follows him and cramps him, he just pulls at it in hopes of not getting hit and gets a top edge that flies fine of fine leg
131kph, short on the hip, he's back and working this to deep midwicket for a couple
133kph, fuller, he charges and stays leg side, he gets a thick edge driving  and it runs to short fine
shorter into the hip, he pulls to square leg
length slower ball, 107kph, he pulls hard to deep midwicket
yorker speared into the feet, 138kph, he jams the bat down to get it behind square
length ball, 141kph, on leg, he clips this neatly forward of square to the gap for two
136kph, low full toss, he walks at it and gets hit on the pad outside leg
yorker on off, 137kph, he jams it out to backward point
length slower ball, he tries to pull but is taken on the pad and they get a leg bye
short outside off, 91kph, he's back and thumping this to deep cover point
full toss outside leg, he sweeps hard and ropes it behind square to the rope!
short on leg, he pulls this behind square to deep backward square
short outside off, he's back and cutting to deep point
slog sweep over deep midwicket! Tossed up outside off, he gets down and reaches out to swat it high into the stands
95kph, pushed through down leg, he's back to try and pull but is taken on the pad
slog sweep over deep square! Tossed up in the arc, he got under this but it's a short boundary and it carries all the way
darted in, he dances down and drives to long on
short and wide, he's back and cutting hard past point and he beats the sweeper!
short and wide again, he threads the gap behind point! Three men are on the circle and he picked the gap!
short and wide again, he hammers this to deep point this time
back of a length, he's back and punching this past cover, Hales was slow to go but eventually they get one
Chest high short ball, he pulls hard forward of square and picks the gap!
shorter length, he's back and working this to midwicket
131kph, length ball, he backs away and hammers this flat over midwicket!
short outside off, 130kph, he tries to pull but is taken on the body, right in the chest, they get a leg bye
133kph, length ball, he tries to work to leg, gets a thick leading edge through point and a misfields allow for an extra run
launched onto the roof at deep square leg! Wow! Length ball and he swung this away with a stunning strike and it made a loud crunch as it landed on the roof of the two-tiered grandstand!
slower ball well wide of off, that was tight. Could have been a wide
106kph, length slower ball, he mistimes a pull to deep midwicket
length slower ball, he gives room and cuts straight to backward point
short slower ball ball, he tries to heave down the ground but gets a thick inside edge to short fine

Given lbw! The back of a the hand slower ball gets him! It was full on off, he sat back and tried to heave over midwicket, missed and was hit on the back pad infront of off. It was hitting. Just a question if it hit in line but it looked very good
fuller, he tries to drive, gets a thick inside edge onto pad and they steal a single
shorter leg break, he's back and punching this to long off
leg break outside off, some turn, he pushes at it getting a thick edge to short third man

an appeal for a stumping! It's sent to the TV umpire. A nice leg break, beats the bat as he drives. McDermott whips the bails off and Hales has his toe down. The square leg umpire just wanted to check the toe was down
94kph, fuller on leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
full outside off, he reaches out and sweeps powerfully forward of square! Incredible timing from Ferguson
92kph, shorter outside off, he's back and pulling to deep square
good length, angled in from a length, he mistimes a drive to midwicket
132kph, shorter and wider, he cuts hard to deep point
shorter on the hip, he spoons a leading edge towards mid on
length ball, 129kph, top of off, he works this to forward square
slower ball, on leg, he chips this in the air off a leading edge and it lands safely behind square
slower ball on leg, he works this to midwicket. 50 to Hales from just 30 balls. That's his third 50 in the past four innings.
knee high full toss, he slog sweeps into the second tier at deep square! Another monstrous blow
full outside off, he square drives firmly to deep cover-point
short and wide, he's back and late cutting past short third man! Nice footwork to wait and place it fine
shorter outside off, he's back and working this to deep midwicket, Hales wanted two but was sent back. He ran halfway down and was sent back!
wrong un, he hammers a sweep through square leg
shorter leg break, he's back and working this through forward square
full outside off, he sweeps hard into the gap at deep square
wrong un, he's back and dabbing it fine to third man
shorter length, he's back and pulling to deep square
wrong un outside off, he's back and punching to deep cover-point
shorter but quicker, he's back and thumping a pull and beating the man at deep midwicket
90kph, full toss, he drives this straight of long on! The man was very square to allow for the right hander hitting with the turn but this didn't land and he thumped it straight
slower ball outside off, he misses a cut
full outside off, he jams a square drive to cover
slower ball on middle, he gives room to square drive to deep cover-point

caught at deep backward square! Slower ball, 115kph, length, he tried to launch this over square leg but just hit it flat to backward square and Milenko runs to his left on the rope and takes a good catch on the rope
slower ball, wide of off, he drives firmly to deep cover
131kph, length ball, he mistimes a cut to cover
tossed up outside off, he sweeps hard and finds the gap at deep midwicket!
shorter length, he's back and trying to pull, gets it off the toe of the bat
shorter, he pulls, mistiming it through square leg
appeal for a stumping and it goes upstairs. Tossed up outside off, he tries to loft down the ground and misses and McDermott whips the bails up but he slides the his right foot back in
Ferguson should have been run out! It was pushed back towards Ahmad and Ferguson took off and was sent back, Ahmad, slid and threw but missed and they get an overthrow
slog sweep in the air towards long on but it's just short of Short running in
93kph, pushed through full, he tries to sweep but misses and it just misses off
a reverse sweep past point! Superb shot. He sets up early and slaps it past point
lofted high over midwicket! Very full drifting into leg, he flicks this with the bottom hand and gets all of it over the fence
shorter and way wide of off
short and wide, he mistimes a cut to cover
darted into leg, he tries to slog sweep but gets a thin edge onto pad
caught at deep midwicket! Full toss in the slot, he could have hit this anywhere and he hits it flat straight to Short on the rope. He picked him out perfectly and Short takes a comfortable catch
full and speared into the pads, it runs fine for a leg bye
bouncer and it's called wide on height. It was too high
full on leg, he clips this straight to deep midwicket
low full toss, he whips this firmly to deep midwicket
slower ball, thick inside edge onto pad, it rolls into the off side, Ellis had a chance to underarm for a run out but couldn't pick cleanly
slower ball, he checks his shot, pushing it to cover-point
he backs away, Ellis follows, full, he swipes this forward of square to the man in the deep
length slower ball, he sits back and heaves this flat to deep midwicket on the bounce
length slower ball, 107kph, on leg, he pulls this in the air behind square but short of the man in the deep
hit like a bullet straight down the ground! Slower ball full in the slot, he cracked this hard straight back past the bowler. The umpire was ducking for cover
126kph, half volley, he lofts over cover! Powerful strike but it was in the slot again with no one back out at cover

Run out after a mix up! Full on leg he slapped this to deep midwicket, Ross wanted two but Morris sent him back but he was too far committed and was left stranded. Good throw from Wright but Ross was already walking off
slower ball sprayed way wide, nearly didn't land on the cut strip
edged to third man! Length slower ball, he swings hard outside off, gets a thick edge and it flies fine of short third man and runs away
138kph, yorker outside off, he steps outside off to scoop but gets it off the toe to short fine
back of the hand slower ball, dips on Sams and hits him on the pad outside leg and rolls away for an extra
caught at deep midwicket! 137kph, in the slot, he missed the yorker length, but Morris mis hit it trying to go over deep midwicket, Wright was there on the rope and took the catch easily
133kph, outside off, he swings so hard and slices this miles over cover, Qais Ahmad runs in from long off but still can't get there! Amazing no one got to that ball
136kph, low full toss at leg, he clips this to deep midwicket
slower ball down leg, he misses and they pinch a bye! That probably should have been a wide. Maybe it flicked the pad
85kph slid through back of a length, he punches back to the bowler
low full toss on off, he drives to long on
tossed up outside off, he crunches a drive through cover! A half volley and he smashed it through the gap
slid through on off, he's back and forcing this to long on
full toss, he skips down and clips this to deep midwicket and Ross does well to limit it to one
low full toss drifting in, he skips out and drives off the toe to long on
134kph, good length, hint of shape, gets a thick inside edge onto pad and it rolls away to the off side
slower ball, down leg, he steps outside off and misses but it was very close to leg. That was good call. He stepped across and exposed leg
bouncer and this is called wide for too high. This was marginal
full outside off, 121kph, slower ball, he drives straight to mid off
launched over square leg into the stands! 138kph, in the slot on middle, he stepped across and clubbed this square over square leg!
full and swinging down leg and this is wide
shorter slower ball outside off, he checks his cut shot to cover and they pinch one
slower ball, 114kph, outside off, beats the edge as he tries to defend
shorter length, he's back and working this past the square leg umpire, it's well weighted into the gap and they take two
shorter on leg, again, he clips this off the hip to the gap at square leg for two more
shorter on middle, he pulls behind square to the man in the deep
back of a length on the hip, he tucks this behind square

top edge straight up and Lenton takes it! It was tossed up in the slot, he went for the slog sweep but he got a top edge that went straight up, Lenton runs out towards midwicket and calls everyone out to take the catch
shorter on leg, he's back and working this through square leg to the sweeper
slower ball, half volley, he leans elegantly on a drive straight of mid on! Classy shot from Short
shorter length, wide of off, he's back and cutting hard to deep point
slower ball outside off, 125kph, he mistimes a drive back to the bowler
full on leg stump, he clips this powerfully to deep square leg
bouncer, over leg, it's too high
134kph, full pitching outside leg, he gets an inside edge onto pad and it rolls away
back of a length, 135kph, outside off, he gets a thick outside edge to short third man
advances and lofts powerfully just straight of long on! Good strike but he might have been nervous as it was close to Morris running across from wide long on
full outside off, he lasers a drive wide of mid off! Freed the arms with the width and cracked it in the gap
90kph, darted into a length on off, he defends to cover
crunched in the air back past the bowler! Tossed up, he skipped out and drive straight and hard a catchable height but it beat him pace
darted through outside off, he misses an attempted cut
fuller on leg, he's back and pushing this to midwicket
shorter slower ball outside off, 110kph, he mistimes a cut to backward square
short slower ball outside off, he mistimes a cut to backward point
cracked forward of square! A chest high short ball and it was nailed forward of square!
slower ball outside off, he tries to launch over long on but misses
slower ball, it grips a touch, he mistimes to cover
slower ball on leg, he clips this behind square and they pinch two
93kph, tossed up on leg, he drives to long on
tossed up on middle, he drives to long on
half volley wide of off, he crunches a drive wide of long off and Hales makes an excellent save. Saves two runs
leading edge sliced to cover! Top spinner on leg, he tried to whip hard through midwicket, closed the face, got a leading edge that flies to cover on the circle! Huge wicket
92kph, length leg break, he's back and working this to midwicket and Khawaja misfields and gets one
full on leg, he works this square of Khawaja at midwicket
back of a length outside off, 130kph, he tries to pull but misses as it skids through
caught at cover! 131kph length ball, he tried to stand up and carve it over mid off, he miscues off the toe and it balloons to Hales on the circle
edged through the vacant slips! Good length outside off, he's caught on the crease, defending, gets a thick edge past the keeper for four
back of a length outside off, he punches off the back foot to cover
caught and bowled chance missed! Would have been a one handed. It was a length ball, chipped back to his right, Tremain flung his right hand out but it didn't stick
129kph, full toss swings wide of off, he drives but misses
driven beautifully past cover! An outswinger, full outside off, he drives on the up, threading the gap with nice timing
back of a length on off, he's back and defending to the bowler
lofted over mid off! Full in the slot outside off, he just lifts this through the line and it nearly carries for six

caught at midwicket! Is that it for George Bailey? A short ball, chest high he pulls nicely, hitting it flat and hard but picks out Green, the substitute fielder, at midwicket and he takes a sharp chance to his left.
bouncer outside off, he leans back and sways inside it
fuller on off, he drives nicely to mid off
full on leg, he's glancing this to short fine
leg break outside off, it holds up, he drives and chips it just short of cover
good length on middle, he defends on the front foot
shorter length, he's back and defending to cover-point

A mix up and Milenko should have been run out! Drifting into leg, it comes off pad, it runs to cover, McDermott wants a run, Milenko is heading backwards, they eventually run, Ferguson had an easy underarm at the keeper's who had run out to try and field but missed
shorter outside off, he's back and cutting to point
fuller outside off, he drives to cover
slower ball outside off, he pushes on the front foot through cover-point to the sweeper
130kph, fuller length outside off, he crunches a drive on the up to long off
short ball, just grips a touch in the wicket, he tries to pull but he's through the shot too early
short and wide, he cuts off the bottom edge to third man
short wide slower ball, he cuts hard to cover
carved over mid off! Half volley in the slot outside off, he sets his base early and drills it over the man in the circle
short slower ball, he swings hard and gets hit on the body, rolls away for a leg bye
he charges early, it's a short slower ball, 122kph, cramps him and he checks his shot to cover
backs away to a length ball and slaps it in the air to mid off and it just falls short of Hales
short slower ball, he backs away and swings hard and misses
head high short ball, he pulls firmly through square leg to the sweeper
123kph, slower ball outside off, he picks it and thumps this hard and flat down the ground and it just lands short of the rope! Good strike
whipped flat through midwicket! Full and wide of off, he reaches out and whips it with the bottom hand with power to the rope
139kph, full and straight, he swings hard and gets a thick inside edge to short fine leg
full and way wide of off, called wide
guided to third man! Full wide yorker, he angles the bat and runs it nicely to third man
length ball wide of off, he square drives on the up backward of deep point and they get two
yorker tailing in, just sneaks under the bat and how did that miss off stump!?
105kph full slower ball, he mistimes a drive towards long on and they pinch two. Well run
brilliant slower ball, just dies off the pitch as he swings hard
short slower ball, he pulls through square leg to the sweeper
130kph, full yorker wide of off, he backs away too far. Well bowled
slower ball outside off, he drives hard on the up to deep cover
short slower ball wide of off, he jumps and upper cuts over point! Good shot to get it up and over
slower ball wide of off, he mistimes a drive that flies towards long off but falls short of the man
slower ball outside off, he swings hard but misses
slower ball pushed too wide of off
full outside off, 117kph, he clears the front leg and carves this to cover

Super catch from Sams running in from deep midwicket! Length ball and he set up to launch over midwicket, he gets a top edge that flies to deep midwicket, it dropped on Sams in the air as he ran in but he got there and took the catch diving forward
slower ball outside off, 114kph, he lofts a drive over cover and it stops in the surface as it lands
wide yorker, 119kph, slower ball, he misses trying to steer it through point
shorter leg break, he's back and working this behind square
caught at long off! Tossed up outside off, he tries to launch down the ground but his weight was back and he doesn't get it, it carries to the rope but not beyond it, Hales is there to take the catch
Bowled him! Brilliantly bowled. He tossed up outside off, he tries to drive away from his body, it slides on through the gate and hits the top of off! Cook on a hat-trick
lbw shout but not out. It's missing leg. Nicely pitched wrong un hits the front pad but it was missing leg
drifting into leg, he clips this firmly to the gap at deep midwicket
full outside off, he drives firmly to long off
140kph, angled into off, he whips this firmly along the ground to deep midwicket
slower ball, full outside off, he opens up and drives to deep cover-point
slower ball wide of off, and it's too wide
length ball outside off, he drags this from outside off to deep midwicket
140kph full yorker tailing into off, he clears the front leg and drives to long off

top edge straight up and Lenton takes it! Length ball, a leg cutter slower ball outside off, he tries to heave to the leg side, gets a top edge that goes straight up, Lenton camps under it and takes a comfortable catch
bouncer down leg and called wide
short and wide, he cuts hard to deep point
118kph, slower ball wide of off, too wide
length ball, he charges and backs away, gets it off the toe end to cover
length ball wide of off, he mistimes a back foot drive to cover
length slower ball, he pulls this through midwicket
fuller outside off, he sits back and drags this through midwicket
yorker on off, he jams the bat down and defends
low full toss, he charges and drives to cover
There's one from Qais! 104kph slower ball, he sat back and picked it, right in his arc and he swung it high over the midwicket fence
caught at backward point! Slower ball wide of off, an off spinner, he backed away and sliced it high off the edge to backward point, Khawaja circle under it and held on. It was a touch awkward
caught at short third man! Another slower ball wide of off, he slices this high off the outside edge to short third man and an easy catch for Nair.
